item.title: Artist Apparel, Vinyl and Collectibles From Amazon’s Official Merch Shop Are on Sale Through Tonight
item.description: From vintage band tees to limited-edition drops, Amazon’s Merch Shop is an untapped goldmine for official artist gear, up to 30 percent off for Prime Day.

item.title: Shopbop’s Inventory Is, in Fact, Part of Prime Day — Here Are the Top 10 Designer Finds on Amazon
item.description: Anine Bing, Jacquemus, Loeffler Randall and Tory Burch are just a few Hollywood-loved labels with steep price drops, live through tonight.
